Package graph

Class AbstractGraph

java.lang.Object
graph.AbstractGraph
All Implemented Interfaces:
IGraph
Direct Known Subclasses:
Graph, WeightedGraph
public abstract class AbstractGraph extends Object implements IGraph
The AbstractGraph class provides a base implementation for common graph operations. It serves as an abstract class that can be extended by concrete graph implementations.
